Name: Requiring DCAS in its annual report regarding eligible lists to include information regarding veterans.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of citywide administrative services in its annual report regarding eligible lists to include information regarding veterans.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Veterans

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1. Subdivision b of section 12-206 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding new paragraphs 8 and 9 to read as follows:
	8. the number of persons who were veterans of any branch of the United States armed services who took open competitive exams.
	9. the number of persons who were veterans of any branch of the United States armed services who were appointed to positions from eligible lists.
	Â§2. This local law shall take effect ninety days after its enactment into law.








MWC
LS 1678
April 8, 2011
